recipesJson.name: Boo Goo
recipesJson.author: noxx1993
recipesJson.description:
This is my first recipe i am releasing on here.

(Flavor Notes to come soon)

This is my take on a raspberry cream it is a lovely raspberry inhale with such a nice sweet exhale.

Really nice shake and vape but does get a lot better from 2 days +

Any Reviews will be much appreciated
